entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early this evening then cloudy. Local blowing snow. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023
